availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Swope (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, agent)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, agent. Maryland native. Father of R. D. Swope. Married to Matilda Maddox Swope in Spencer County, Kentucky, on October 28, 1824. Father of Amanda Swope, Eliza J. Swope, Amanda Swope, and Julia Ann Swope. Resident in Louisville in 1850. Agent in Louisville in 1860. Stock jobber in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 202.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 504.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 7, p. 63A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Spencer County Marriages, 1824-1926, Film 000482500, p. 369.
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 242.
Find A Grave, "George Swope (1789-1876)," Memorial 150311976, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/150311976 (accessed June 8, 2020).
